summary: A look at the intimate moments of a man's life as he decides to commit a calculated act of aggression.
cast: Arturo Goetz|Julia Zapelli Gugliotta|José Goñi|Maya Lesca|Victoria Pedemonte|Bárbara Lombardo|Germán de Silva|Juan Pablo Piemonte|Alejandro Ruaise|Lea Kalinna|Verónica Piaggio|Guillermo Arengo|Julia Martínez Rubio|Carolina Balbi|María Laura Cali|Ana Luchetti|Elizabeth Dillon|Vibian Villarrazo|María Celeste Tabeni
title: El asaltante
